title: travelplanner: Can you prepare a travel plan for a group of 7 departing from Appleton to Charlotte? This will be a 3-day trip from March 18th to March 20th, 2022. Our budget for this trip is $9,500. Please ensure our accommodations allow visitors, as per the house rules. (64d3fcc38cfb3e43)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan with the `submit_day_plan` function for each day of the trip!

chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
Here is a suggested three-day itinerary for attractions and activities in Charlotte:

**Day 1:**
1. Start your day at the Levine Museum of the New South (401 S Tryon St). This museum offers an insightful journey through Charlotte's history and culture, with exhibits showcasing the city's past, present, and future.
2. After exploring the museum, head to the nearby Discovery Place Science (301 N Tryon St). This interactive science museum is perfect for all ages, featuring hands-on exhibits, planetarium shows, and engaging educational programs.

**Day 2:**
1. Visit the NASCAR Hall of Fame (400 E M.L.K. Jr Blvd) to immerse yourself in the world of racing. The Hall of Fame celebrates the history and achievements of NASCAR with interactive exhibits, racing simulators, and a tribute to NASCAR legends.
2. In the afternoon, explore the Bechtler Museum of Modern Art (420 S Tryon St) for a cultural experience. This museum showcases a diverse range of modern and contemporary art, with both permanent and rotating exhibitions.

**Day 3:**
1. Begin your day at the UNC Charlotte Botanical Gardens (9090 Craver Rd). These lush gardens offer a peaceful escape, featuring various themed gardens, a greenhouse, and walking trails. It's an excellent spot for nature lovers and those seeking tranquility.
2. End your trip by visiting the Billy Graham Library (4330 Westmont Dr) to learn about the life and legacy of the renowned evangelist. The library features interactive exhibits, a memorial prayer garden, and a bookstore.

There are many more attractions in Charlotte, and you can easily spend more days exploring the city's parks, historical sites, and unique museums. Enjoy your trip and feel free to ask for further recommendations tailored to your interests!
chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
**Day 1 –**

- 06:58: Fly from Appleton to Charlotte with Flight F3796721. The flight costs $314 per person and arrives in Charlotte at 10:25.
- 11:00: Grab breakfast at Life Grand Cafe (25).
- 12:00: Start your day at the Levine Museum of the New South (401 S Tryon St). This museum offers an insightful journey through Charlotte's history and culture, with exhibits showcasing the city's past, present, and future.
- 13:30: After exploring the museum, head to the nearby Discovery Place Science (301 N Tryon St). This interactive science museum is perfect for all ages, featuring hands-on exhibits, planetarium shows, and engaging educational programs.
- 17:00: Head to Behrouz Biryani (19) for dinner or to Prince Snacks & Momo's Point (11) for a snack and some tea.

**Day 2 –**

- 10:00: Visit the NASCAR Hall of Fame (400 E M.L.K. Jr Blvd) to immerse yourself in the world of racing. The Hall of Fame celebrates the history and achievements of NASCAR with interactive exhibits, racing simulators, and a tribute to NASCAR legends.
- 13:00: In the afternoon, explore the Bechtler Museum of Modern Art (420 S Tryon St) for a cultural experience. This museum showcases a diverse range of modern and contemporary art, with both permanent and rotating exhibitions.
- 19:00: For dinner, enjoy a meal at Nagaland's Kitchen (73), Olive Tree Cafe (23), or Burger King (15).

**Day 3 –**

- 10:00: Begin your day at the UNC Charlotte Botanical Gardens (9090 Craver Rd). These lush gardens offer a peaceful escape, featuring various themed gardens, a greenhouse, and walking trails. It's an excellent spot for nature lovers and those seeking tranquility.
- 13:00: End your trip by visiting the Billy Graham Library (4330 Westmont Dr) to learn about the life and legacy of the renowned evangelist. The library features interactive exhibits, a memorial prayer garden, and a bookstore.
- 19:00: Grab some dinner at Subway (60), Chicken Inn (18), or Central Perk 7 (87).

Unfortunately, I was unable to find flights for groups of 7, so I've suggested one-way flights for 1 person. If you'd like to book these flights for your group, please let me know. I was also unable to find accommodations available in Charlotte, North Carolina.

I've submitted your 3-day travel plan for your trip to Charlotte.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here is a suggested three-day itinerary for attractions and activities in Charlotte:

**Day 1:**
1. Start your day at the Levine Museum of the New South (401 S Tryon St). This museum offers an insightful journey through Charlotte's history and culture, with exhibits showcasing the city's past, present, and future.
2. After exploring the museum, head to the nearby Discovery Place Science (301 N Tryon St). This interactive science museum is perfect for all ages, featuring hands-on exhibits, planetarium shows, and engaging educational programs.

**Day 2:**
1. Visit the NASCAR Hall of Fame (400 E M.L.K. Jr Blvd) to immerse yourself in the world of racing. The Hall of Fame celebrates the history and achievements of NASCAR with interactive exhibits, racing simulators, and a tribute to NASCAR legends.
2. In the afternoon, explore the Bechtler Museum of Modern Art (420 S Tryon St) for a cultural experience. This museum showcases a diverse range of modern and contemporary art, with both permanent and rotating exhibitions.

**Day 3:**
1. Begin your day at the UNC Charlotte Botanical Gardens (9090 Craver Rd). These lush gardens offer a peaceful escape, featuring various themed gardens, a greenhouse, and walking trails. It's an excellent spot for nature lovers and those seeking tranquility.
2. End your trip by visiting the Billy Graham Library (4330 Westmont Dr) to learn about the life and legacy of the renowned evangelist. The library features interactive exhibits, a memorial prayer garden, and a bookstore.

There are many more attractions in Charlotte, and you can easily spend more days exploring the city's parks, historical sites, and unique museums. Enjoy your trip and feel free to ask for further recommendations tailored to your interests!
